Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: reviewer
Reviews.Content: I was able to extend the cable on my Spy On A Bird HD camera with this cable.  Now, I can protect the connection box and not worry about water/weather damage

ProductInfo.Features:
3m/9ft extension cable for the Breakout Box
Supports all Y-cam Bullet & EyeBall cameras
Extend the distance from the Breakout Box to your Bullet or Eyeball by 3m/9ft
Use to install Y-cam Bullet & Eyeball cameras farther away from the indoor Breakout Box connection point
ProductInfo.Name: Y-cam 3 Meter Breakout Box Extension YCACBEW3
